name: Slide The Numbers
description:
FEATURES

  • Beautiful HD graphics
  • Game mode easy to learn, hard to master
  • Six board sizes (3x3, 4x4, 5x5, 6x6, 7x7 and 8x8)
  • Six game modes (Horizontal, Vertical, Left Diagonal, Right Diagonal, Snake and Snail)
  • Once per game you can exchange two numbers

CONTROLS

  • Pause - Pause key
